title: Asian Stocks Extend Rally to Record, Gold Falls: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities rose on Tuesday as a recovery in US tech stocks gathered momentum after last week’s selloff tied to concerns over spending on artificial intelligence.
content: Asian equities rose on Tuesday as a recovery in US tech stocks gathered momentum after last week’s selloff tied to concerns over spending on artificial intelligence.
